main: ^Greetings little one. I'm glad to see you've finally awoken
WhereAmI: ^You are in the Rock Shelter Dream world.
^Well, at least whats left of it.
WhoAreYou: ^I have been travelling through the Dream Worlds in search of a brave hero
^And it appears I have found you.
WhatDo: ^I see you already have a light holder with you
^Elements of this world will interact when exposed to a light
^Try collecting light in the world and using them on different things
^The colour of your light is also important
DreamWorlds: ^Yes. Pocket realities created by the collective consciousness of people and entered through dreams
WhatsLeft: ^This Dream World is being destroyed by horrible nightmares of some greater evil
^If we don't act quickly, other Dream Worlds will suffer the same fate!
